chart_description: The Database reads chart displays the rate of bytes read from the database. It is a useful metric to monitor the load on the database server, as high read rates can indicate heavy usage or data retrieval from the database.

dimension_descriptions.disk: This dimension represents the disk space used by the database. Monitoring this dimension can help you identify disk space constraints, which can impact the performance of the database server.
dimension_descriptions.memory: This dimension represents the memory used by the database. Monitoring this dimension can help you identify memory constraints, which can impact the performance of the database server.
